content: Ho sentito che delle impronte di un abominevole uomo delle nevi sono state scoperte in Himalaya.
translations: eng:I heard that footprints of an abominable snowman have been discovered in the Himalayas
eng:I heard that footprints of an abominable snowman were found in the Himalayan mountains
